roleset.name: not apparent, obvious
roleset.note: UNCLEAR-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-seedcorpus, relation to 'clarify.01, clear-j.01'. (from unclear.01-j)

role.descr: causer of lack of clarity, failing to make clear

example.name: arg1
example.text: It is unclear if this communicates with the vein or is a large lymph node .
example.arg: if this communicates with the vein or is a large lymph node

roleset.name: obstructed in some way, murky
roleset.note: UNCLEAR-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. Relation to 'clear.02'. (from unclear.02-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: Under the influence of the alcohol , and with a hot head , he got into an Infiniti and drove away ; at that moment , his " mind was unclear . "
